name: Swarm of Manabane Scarabs
movement: walk 10 ft., fly 20 ft., burrow 20 ft.
description: A swarm of small, insect-like creatures that possess the ability to disrupt magic and drain magical items. The swarm can occupy spaces of other creatures and move through tiny openings.
memorable: It excels at countering spellcasters, having limited magic immunity and the ability to drain magic from items.
goals: To disrupt magic and combat spellcasters effectively.
relations: May be encountered in areas rich in magic or near spellcasters.
environment: Often found in magical locales or places where spellcasting is common.
strengths: Good defenses with damage resistances and condition immunities. Advantage on saving throws against spells.
weaknesses: Low offensive capabilities and inability to regain hit points.
attacks: Utilizes Bites for piercing damage and can disrupt magical effects.
most_powerful_ability: Limited Magic Immunity, allowing it protection from lower-level spells.
senses: Possesses blindsight, darkvision, and tremorsense, offering great sensory capabilities for tracking targets.
skills: Proficient in Stealth and has decent Perception.
additional_information: Drains magic from items in its space.
Can sense magic within a 120-foot radius at will.
Cannot regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.
